Unitron/Oblitertron/Ramhorn:



Ramhorn cursed, ducking, the missiles going by him.  As they 
exploded, Ramhorn went flying forward, smashing to the ground.

---

Unitron, back turned to Hun-Grr, was shot, slamming into 
Oblitertron's right calf, falling backwards to the ground.

---

Oblitertron let out a loud yell, looking down with his crimson optics 
to see Unitron the ground, Hun-Grr with a weapon, and facing Unitron.

"OBLITERTRON OBLITERATE TRAITORS" he bellowed, raising his left palm, 
the 45 ft high gestalt firing off a missile from his left palm at the 
middle of the Terrorcons.
